# The `FixedSizeStorage` Struct Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A type where its <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/trailingobjects/fixedsizestorage/with-counts">with&#95;counts</a> template member has a ::type member suitable for use as uninitialized storage for an object with the given trailing object counts. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

A type where its <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/trailingobjects/fixedsizestorage/with-counts">with&#95;counts</a> template member has a ::type member suitable for use as uninitialized storage for an object with the given trailing object counts.

The template arguments are similar to those of additionalSizeToAlloc.

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> with <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/trailingobjects/fixedsizestorageowner">FixedSizeStorageOwner</a>, e.g.:


<ProgramListing extension="cpp">

<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">MyObj::FixedSizeStorage&lt;void &#42;&gt;::with&#95;counts&lt;1u&gt;::type myStackObjStorage;</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">MyObj::FixedSizeStorageOwner</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">    myStackObjOwner(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">new</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;)&amp;myStackObjStorage) MyObj);</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">MyObj &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> myStackObjPtr = myStackObjOwner.get();</span></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>

Definition at line 352 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/trailingobjects-h">TrailingObjects.h</a>.
